Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Catapult = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true
local catapultHealth = 600
local catapultActive = false local myCatapult local catapultWeld
local frontAxleWeld local backAxleWeld
local damage = 50
local projectile = Instance.new("Part") projectile.FormFactor = 3 projectile.Size = Vector3.new(2.4, 2.4, 2.4) projectile.Name = "Projectile" projectile.CanCollide = false
local projectileMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") projectileMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=1290033" projectileMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=1290030" projectileMesh.Parent = projectile
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = projectile
local antiFloatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") antiFloatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, -90000, 0) antiFloatForce.Parent = myTorso
local lightForce = Instance.new("BodyForce")
local jumpConnection local runningConnection
function destroyCatapult() Catapult.Transparency = 0.0 if myCatapult then myCatapult:Remove() end if catapultWeld then catapultWeld:Remove() end catapultActive = false if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 local ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 end if jumpConnection then jumpConnection:disconnect() end if runningConnection then runningConnection:disconnect() end if antiFloatingForce then antiFloatingForce:Remove() end end
function boom(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then if hit.Parent:IsA("Tool") then local tool = hit.Parent local character = tool.Parent local player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(player) if player then catapultHealth = catapultHealth - 75 if catapultHealth < 0 then destroyCatapult() end end else if hit.Parent == game.Workspace and hit.Velocity.magnitude > 30 then -- It might be a projectile, lets just do damage catapultHealth = catapultHealth - 60 if catapultHealth < 0 then destroyCatapult() end end end end end
function blow(hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil and player ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function shoot(target, direction, distance) if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end local projectileClone = projectile:Clone()
local speed = 50
local upVector = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) local dy = direction.Y direction = (direction * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1)) local dxz = direction.magnitude local xzVelocity = direction.unit * speed local yVelocity = ((speed * dy / dxz) + ((196.1 * dxz)/(2 * speed))) * upVector
print(dy, dxz)
local spawnPos = myTorso.Position
projectileClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector) projectileClone.Velocity = xzVelocity + yVelocity projectileClone.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, projectileClone:GetMass() * 190, 0)
projectileClone.Parent = game.Workspace projectileClone.Touched:connect(blow) debris:AddItem(projectileClone, 7)
wait(0.5) projectileClone.CanCollide = true end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
if catapultActive == false then
Tool.Enabled = false catapultActive = true
myCatapult = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(69939157):GetChildren()[1] if myCatapult and myCatapult:FindFirstChild("Base") then Catapult.Transparency = 1.0
myCatapult.Parent = game.Workspace
myCatapult:MoveTo(myTorso.Position + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 5.0)
if myCatapult:FindFirstChild("Base") then myCatapult.Base.CFrame = CFrame.new(myCatapult.Base.Position, myCatapult.Base.Position + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) local children = myCatapult:GetChildren() local mass = 0 for i = 1, #children do if children[i]:IsA("BasePart") then mass = mass + children[i]:GetMass() -- Not used! end end
myCatapult.Base.Touched:connect(boom) end
wait(0.5)
catapultWeld = Instance.new("Weld") catapultWeld.Parent = myTorso catapultWeld.Part0 = myTorso catapultWeld.Part1 = myCatapult.Base catapultWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, -5, 0, 1, 0, -2.18556949e-007, -2.18556949e-007, 9.55342796e-015, -1, 0, 1, 9.55342711e-015)
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 4.0 myTorso.Anchored = false
catapultHealth = 600
local ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 300 while myHumanoid.MaxHealth < 300 do myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 300 end while myHumanoid.Health < ratio * 300 do myHumanoid.Health = myHumanoid.Health * 300 end
jumpConnection = myHumanoid.Jumping:connect(function() if myTorso and myTorso:FindFirstChild("BF") == nil then local antigravForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") antigravForce.force = Vector3.new(0, -990001, 0) antigravForce.Name = "BF" antigravForce.Parent = myTorso wait(0.7) if antigravForce then antigravForce:Remove() end end end)
if myCatapult and myCatapult:FindFirstChild("Base") then local base = myCatapult.Base if base:FindFirstChild("FrontAxleWeld") and base:FindFirstChild("BackAxleWeld") then frontAxleWeld = base.FrontAxleWeld backAxleWeld = base.BackAxleWeld end end
runningConnection = myHumanoid.Running:connect(function() if frontAxleWeld and backAxleWeld then frontAxleWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(math.pi/8, 0, 0) * frontAxleWeld.C1 backAxleWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(math.pi/8, 0, 0) * backAxleWeld.C1 end if myTorso and myTorso:FindFirstChild("BV") == nil then end end)
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(90) destroyCatapult() end))
wait(2.0) Tool.Enabled = true else Tool.Enabled = true end else local base = myCatapult:FindFirstChild("Base") if base then local distance = (myTorso.Position - base.Position).magnitude print(distance) if distance < 12 then Tool.Enabled = false -- Shoot warrocks coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() if myCatapult and myCatapult:FindFirstChild("Base") then local base = myCatapult.Base local lWeld = base:FindFirstChild("LauncherWeld") if lWeld then local frames = 9 local initCFrame = lWeld.C1 while frames > 0 do if frames < 5 then -- snap back lWeld.C1 = lWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/16, 0, 0) else lWeld.C1 = lWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/20, 0, 0) end frames = frames - 1 wait(0.15) end lWeld.C1 = initCFrame end end end)) local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint wait(0.90) local direction = (target - myTorso.Position) local distance = (target - myTorso.Position).magnitude shoot(target, direction, distance) wait(3.0) Tool.Enabled = true end end end end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
Catapult.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, -0.4, -1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function onUnequipped() destroyCatapult() catapultHealth = 600 end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
local breakIt = Tool:FindFirstChild("BreakCatapult") while breakIt == nil do breakIt = Tool:FindFirstChild("BreakCatapult") end
breakIt.Changed:connect(function() if breakIt and breakIt.Value == true and catapultActive and myCatapult and myCatapult:FindFirstChild("Base") then if catapultWeld then catapultWeld:Remove() end wait(0.35) myCatapult.Base.CFrame = myCatapult.Base.CFrame + Vector3.new(1, 3.5, 0) myCatapult.Base.Anchored = true wait(0.6) myCatapult.Base.Anchored = false if myCatapult then myCatapult:BreakJoints() end if myTorso and myTorso:FindFirstChild("CatapultWeld") then myTorso.CatapultWeld:Remove() end
debris:AddItem(myCatapult, 3) catapultActive = false if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 local ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 end
if jumpConnection then jumpConnection:disconnect() end if runningConnection then runningConnection:disconnect() end
local players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do if players[i] and players[i].Character and players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") and players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") and players[i] ~= vPlayer then local torso = players[i].Character.Torso local humanoid = players[i].Character.Humanoid local distance = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude if distance < 12 then humanoid.Sit = true humanoid:TakeDamage(40) end end end
Catapult.Transparency = 0.0
wait(9.0) breakIt.Value = false else wait(5.0) breakIt.Value = false end end)

local Tool = script.Parent local Catapult = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local breakAnim
function breakIt(key) if key:lower() == "q" then local breakC = Tool:FindFirstChild("BreakCatapult") if breakC and breakC.Value == false then breakAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.BreakAnim) if breakAnim then breakAnim:Play() end breakC.Value = true end end end
function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse then vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") mouse.KeyDown:connect(breakIt) end end
function onUnequipped() if breakAnim then breakAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
